author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Amyris Q1 GAAP Loss Per Share $1.79
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Amyris Inc:
* AMYRIS CONTINUES STRONG MOMENTUM AND EXECUTION WITH 77% REVENUE GROWTH AND EXCEEDS GROSS MARGIN TARGET
* Q1 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.52
* Q1 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $1.79 * Q1 REVENUE $23 MILLION VERSUS $13 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
